name: chicagotribune
text:
President Trump talked in private about the “deadly” coronavirus last February, even as he was declaring to America it was no worse than the flu, according to a new book by journalist Bob Woodward.

“I wanted to always play it down,” the president said. https://t.co/yccVfBg4U7
